channel.title: podcast on GIVE UP ENGLISH
channel.description: Recent content in podcast on GIVE UP ENGLISH

item.title: Edison Chen Speaks about Entrepreneurship
item.description: I think one of the most important things is how to mesh what you know and try to bring it to a larger conversation so that everyone does not have to change what they want to do. People may not understand what you’re talking about or what you’re thinking, but if you have a good idea, sooner or later, they are going to jump on and start to give you a praise.

item.title: Daniel Wu - On the Journey
item.description: Can you live as a basic human being?
